name: dog (kirinokirino)
description:
play fetch with your dog! unfortunately, the simulation is desintegrating, be careful. although the dog may look iffy, its fine, it was ethically sourced. sticks ammunition is limited to 100, 100 sticks should be enough for everybody.

controls:

esc to quit

wasd, ",aoe", arrows to move

left click to throw a stick, right click to pickup nearby sticks.

in emergency cases, use teleport with middle mouse button. no scrollwheel? you live a dangerous life, i wish you good luck!
